title: Sacramento Shooting: Police say 6 adults killed, 12 others shot downtown; Search for multiple shooters - KCRA Sacramento
content:
1. Sacramento Shooting: Police say 6 adults killed, 12 others shot downtown; Search for multiple shooters  KCRA Sacramento
  2. Sacramento mass shooting: Officials hold news conference after 6 people were killed | CBS News  CBS News
  3. ‘Bus caught in the crossfire’: Pop duo Aly and AJ release statement on shooting after Crest Theatre show  KTXL FOX 40 Sacramento
  4. CA must act on gun laws after Sacramento mass shooting  Sacramento Bee
  5. Police: At least 2 shooters kill 6, wound 12 in Sacramento  Yahoo News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Police in California are searching for multiple suspects in connection with a mass shooting early Sunday in downtown Sacramento that claimed six lives and left 10 other people injured.
